metadata.description: A V.R. rhythm game set in space.

content.paragraph:
Stellar Pulse is an immersive VR rhythm game set in a dynamic space environment, where you must navigate through rings and defeat enemies.
Armed with a ship in each hand, each representing a different color, your mission is to fly through the matching colored rings while simultaneously fending off enemies that attack or evade you

Set to the beat of vibrant music, the gameplay challenges you to move with precision and rhythm. With each song, you'll need to perform fluid, dance-like movements to dodge attacks and hit targets, all while striving to surpass your high score and master the choreography of the universe.
